Title: Requires all washing machines be sold with a microfiber filtration system and proper notice of such system
Summary: Requires all washing machines be sold with a microfiber filtration system and proper notice of such system; provides that on and after January first, two thousand twenty-nine, a new washing machine shall not be sold or offered for sale in the state for residential, commercial, or state use unless the washing machine meets both of the following requirements: contains a microfiber filtration system with a mesh size of not greater than one hundred micrometers; and bears a conspicuous label that is visible to the consumer, in the form of a sticker or any other label type, that includes the following statement: "Notice: This washing machine contains a filter to capture microfibers. Check filter regularly and dispose of captured lint in a waste bin."; provides penalties.
